fish.name: Salmon
attack_flavour_text: The salmon slaps your face with its tail!
Flip Flop Flippity Flop! The salmon flops on!
fish.death_flavour_text: The salmon flops around on the ground, dead.

papa.name: Mr.Lobs
attack_flavour_text: Papa Lobs slaps you with his big, fat, hairy hand!
papa.death_flavour_text: Papa Lobs falls to the ground, dead.

deer.name: Deer
attack_flavour_text: The deer kicks you in the shins!
deer.death_flavour_text: The deer falls to the ground, dead.

mama.name: Ms. Lobs
attack_flavour_text: Papa Lobs slaps you with his big, fat, hairy hand!

shoot.name: Shoot
shoot.flavour_text: Ms. Lobs shoots you with a gun!
shoot.flavour_text_miss:
Ms. Lobs shoots but whiffs her shot!
		Now's your chance!

bomb.name: Bomb
bomb.flavour_text: Ms.Lobs lobs a bomb at you! Ouch.

move.flavour_text:
Mama Lob is on the move.
		Is she running away?
		Or is she coming for you?

mama.death_flavour_text: Papa Lobs falls to the ground, dead.
